That’s what helps me face these days that are all the same, these mute crystals on the shelves, and lunch and dinner at that same horrible cafe.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m currently a Software Engineer at Zalo working as a backend engineer. I studied Computer Science at the Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology. I have a thrist for knowledge and learning new things.
